title: OpenPGP
content: What's going on? All of a sudden today, without anything I've done as far as I know, all my pre-2024 emails are encrypted. When trying to open one I get "The secret key that is required to decrypt this message is not available". I did go an establish a key per the instructions I saw for doing so --> account settings, end-to-end encryption, OpenPGP add key. Well, .... nada, zip, zero .... nothing changed; I still can't open pre-2024 emails. So, what gives?
creator: roesenerofidaho

title: thunderbird "losing emails" and redownloading all of them
content: For the 2nd time this week Thunderbird appears to have "lost" most or all of my emails so that, when I sign back in, it has to redownload them all. What is causing this? I've used TB for many years and I cannot remember it ever doing this before!
creator: rearlclay2

title: Precisazione
content: A seguito della mia e mail inviata pochi minuti fa leggo che mi è stata inviata una copia ad un indirizzo per me non valido cioè1952robyrobis questo indirizzo è stato fatto inconsapevolmente quello giusto per la mia posta e e-mail è robyrobis32@gmail.com come posso correggere l'errore? Grazie per la risposta Giuliani Roberto
creator: 1952robyrobis

title: Attachments are disabled
content:
Attachments to emails in my "sent" folder have a strikethrough and I can not open them. However when I use the web client of my email provider (GoDaddy) these attachments are good and can be opened through the web client (MS 365).

Attachments in my subfolders are also disabled. This is a HUGE problem as I store important documents (as attachments to emails I have received) in Subfolders. 

It seems that the attachments have been somehow deleted in Thunderbird when moved out of the inbox.  Note in picture submitted it says "5 attachments 0 bytes).  (again, these attachments exist in the same email on web client and can be accessed and opened normally)

Attachments in my inbox can still be accessed normally

This problem has only started recently. Because these attachments are good and can be opened through web client, the issue must be within thunderbird.

I am running 115.7.0 GoDaddy is provider. Using Owl as conduit to MS 365
creator: dd7

title: Re: how messages are displayed
content:
Hello, In the last couple of weeks, messages are not displaying as they did. So for example, I received screenshots of an airline trip I'm doing, but the message contained the following: [A screenshot of a computer Description automatically generated] Inbound Another example is receiving an email from a bank. Instead of showing the embedded link, it displayed as html. So, I can't read what was sent. Or it's hard to pick out the link.

I've gone to privacy and controls, but I can't find where I need to change this. Please help.
creator: jennifer.mann.ca

title: replacing my old laptop (this one) but cannot remember the Email or password I used ! How can I find them ?
content: How can I find my set up details on this PC so I can set up a new one ?
creator: 65patriot

title: problem when i try to create a new account with a gmail address, connection to the server fails
content:
I have a gmail account which works fine using Thunderbird on a Windows 10 computer. I am trying to create the same account on another Windows 10 computer using Thunderbird but it fails when trying to connect to the account.

I have checked the identifier, the password and the authentification settings wih OAuth, but it still fails. Any idea why and what is going wrong ?
creator: tarik.ligwan

title: EMAIL NO LONGER SHOWING BODY OF MESSAGES ON HOME PAGE
content: My home page of emails only lists the headers and no longer shows the first few lines of the body of the message. No matter what I try - in view etc - I can't get it restored to what I used to have. Please help! Thanks
creator: rsartist

title: Save Query Folders Don't Activate
content:
I have a saved query folder that I use to view the contents of three folders, each in their own IMAP account. When I select this folder, the queries don't run -- I have to go into each individual folder first to initiate another check before this folder populates.

Can someone explain how this works? Perhaps I need to subscribe to the IMAP folders to keep them actively checked/updated? I would expect that when I enter into the stored query that it would perform that query and those folders would be checked.

Thanks.
creator: forrie1
